title: Did Hillary Clinton Donate $700,000 to the Campaign of FBI Director’s Wife?
subtitle: Andrew McCabe did not have any oversight of the investigation into Secretary Clinton's email server while his wife was running for political office.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Hillary Clinton illegally donated $700,000 to the political campaign of the wife of the FBI director who was supervising the investigation into her use of a private email server.
